newsitem.title: USA: Heavy damage from Arkansas tornadoes.
newsitem.headline: Heavy damage from Arkansas tornadoes.

text.p: Tornadoes touched down in several areas of Arkansas Saturday, damaging and destroying homes and overturning trailer trucks, officials said.
An undetermined number of injuries were reported and damages were being assessed, said Becky Crum, an operations officer for the Arkansas Office of Emergency Services.
"We've got many injuries and many homes and business damaged in Arkadelphia," a small city about 50 miles southwest of Little Rock, said Crum.
"There are big trucks overturned or wrecked all along the highway," said Brian Loeb, an Arkansas motorist on Interstate 40 who drove near the area.
There were also reports of heavy damage to as many as 45 homes in southwest Little Rock.
